original_text: And all the people went over Jordan. And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
korean_text: 백성이 다 요단을 건너매 왕도 건너가서 왕이 바르실래에게 입을 맞추고 그에게 복을 비니 그가 자기 곳으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: And all the people went over Jordan.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 백성이 요단 강을 건넜습니다.

sentences.original_text: And when the king was come over,
and he returned unto his own place.
